content: @eddyb do you have any recommendations on how to write a test for #60925? I've implemented what you've suggested but haven't been able to get a test written.
Unsure if that's because the issue says it happens on MacOS and I'm not on a MacOS.
it doesn't happen only on macOS, it's on all platforms
all you need is an impl inside a module named llvm, I think?
